title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: The JAR creation process fails when there are unsaved editors.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR even with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, a dialog should be displayed to allow saving them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open multiple files in the IDE. 2. Make changes to some of the files without saving them. 3. Open the JAR packager wizard. 4. Enter all the necessary fields. 5. Click 'Finish'.
